title: Need to ID or find Similar Font for Logo Redraw
content:
I am redrawing this logo for a client but have had no luck identifying the typeface, hand drawn maybe? Probably not, I'm pretty sure I've seen it before. Any help from the type gurus?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110519141635im_/http:/typophile.com/files/il_430xN_6634.72619478.jpg)

I'm looking to either ID the exact typeface or to find something similar.

Thanks in advance!

author: dizerr

comments.content:
You should become an IDer at the Board! Nice find.

- Mike Yanega
